item.title: How do i make my client connect to my server?
item.dc:creator: @Fr33b1e Fr33b1e
item.description:
@Fr33b1e wrote:

Then the server is down, or put your server up, make sure the IP on the client is the same as yours, and make sure the port is the same as the server you’re trying to connect to.

item.title: How do i make my client connect to my server?
item.dc:creator: @Fr33b1e Fr33b1e
item.description:
@Fr33b1e wrote:

Set your client’s IP to yours, and the port to your port for your server. So, if you couldn’t change the IP on the log-in screen, open your client.java, and search for the current IP it has, and change it to yours. NOTE:There’s two of them, change them both. For the port, just search for “port” and you’ll have to search for a bit, then you’ll find it. I can’t remember what to search for exactly, sorry about that.

Read full topic
